name: SupportMoulderVanessaA
_source: uu;Moulder;Left;Vanessa;Right
s;Moulder;I'm glad to see you well, Vanessa. You do your fellow pegasus knights proud.|We are blessed to have you fighting at our side.
e;Vanessa;Smile
s;Vanessa;You credit us warriors too much, Father. Without healers, we would all be lost.|Nothing I say can tell you how much I value your presence here.
s;Moulder;We are all doing our part in this war.|No need to thank me.
e;Vanessa;NoSmile
s;Vanessa;I'm serious!|Without your help, we would never survive these skirmishes!
s;Moulder;I'm gratified by that. Thank you.
s;Vanessa;Father... Thank you again for the other day.
s;Moulder;Hmm? Oh, you mean that story?
s;Vanessa;Yes.
s;Moulder;Ah...|You know, you remind me of myself, twenty years back.
s;Vanessa;Huh?
s;Moulder;Oh, never mind...{br}...|Good luck to you, Vanessa.|I don't know where this will lead, but I'm sure the prince knows your feelings.
s;Vanessa;Father Moulder, I only aspire to be worthy of his greatness.|I expect nothing in return.
s;Moulder;Are you sure?
s;Vanessa;...;no_talk

s;Moulder;Well, do what you think is best for you.|We all carry many burdens... To country, family, duty, honor...|However, we are all ultimately free to embrace or reject those burdens.|If you find yourself in need of spiritual guidance, speak to me.
s;Vanessa;Father Moulder, you're so kind.|{c:e;Vanessa;Smile}Thank you. I'm so grateful to have you on the field with me.
s;Moulder;Vanessa, we fight for the greater good.|We fight for our country, for our friends, and...for ourselves.
s;Vanessa;You're right, Father. In so many things.
rrr
